column1: Lemur catta;Ring-tailed Lemur;The most famous of over 100 species of lemurs. Until recently
column2: it was one of Madagascar's most popular primates. Unfortunately
column4: its population has decreased by as much as 97%. The diet of ring-tailed lemurs is primarily fruit
column6: seeds and sometimes insects. Their herd is led by the largest and strongest female. She is responsible for finding a new feeding ground and shelter for the night.;EN;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/11496/115565760
